channel.description: Recent content in python on Dataland

item.title: Creating Python modules like R packages
item.description: An R user created a package in Python - you will not believe what happened next I am a Data Scientist at a consulting firm in Sweden. I have a background in statistics and social science but have spent the last couple of years mainly trying to understand consumers and how they behave. I have worked with everything from making Powerpoint presentations to building recommender systems. In other words I am a pretty typical data scientist.
